__e: Through my pictures, I just want to share «moments of life».
Thank you to spend a few moments of your life with me
With these «moments of life», I hope to share with you some of my passion for photography.
- Now, maybe you can imagine how Tom felt those last moments. Dying out here, all alone.
Thank you for waiting a few moments before the started of the map.
She retained her senses perfectly, called me a few moments before she died and asked distinctly for water.
Arriving here in Brussels a short time ago, the NATO Secretary General...
You know for one moment the greatest player that I ever saw... was thinking about me.
Just moments ago Senator Martin taped this dramatic personal plea.
Will you not come and sit at His feet for a while and hear what is in His heart for you?
Finally, the end of the road ! Few seconds more and holidays will really begin.
